title: utia-gc/diff-chip-seq params.samplesheet schema
description: Schema for the samplesheet used as input to utia-gc/diff-chip-seq

sampleName.errorMessage: Sample name must be provided and cannot contain spaces

lane.errorMessage: Sequencing lane for the library, must be 0-999. Also excepts literal three digit lane numbers, e.g. '001'

target.errorMessage: Target molecule for the ChIP library.

controlType.errorMessage: Type of control library for the ChIP library. Must be one of: [none, input, mock].

reads1.errorMessage: FastQ file for reads 1 must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.fq.gz' or '.fastq.gz'

reads2.errorMessage: FastQ file for reads 2 cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.fq.gz' or '.fastq.gz'
